item.title: Devlog #1 â€“ Project Kickoff
item.description:
Today I officially started Bimbux Studios.

What I worked on

  • Project structure
  • Initial ideas
  • Tooling (Hugo, Git, VS Code)

This devlog will serve as a history of my progress in game development.
